ComicInfo.Title: Notes #36; Whatta Year!; It's a Bitchy, Bitchy Bitchy Bitchy World!; Going Buggy; Another Damned Dream!; The Secret!; Welcome to the Real World!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 20:29:56. [CVDB164619] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:45:01. [Issue ID 170749]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Describes trips to California and to France and Belgium, working two jobs, writing a novel
Midge bumps into Barb at the supermarket. The next day she stops by a gallery and finds an exhibit by Kenney featuring photos of herself. She tells Barb about it over coffee and they go back and confront Kenney; to save face with his girlfriend he accuses Midge of being Barb's lover, in front of her actual partner and child.
Patty battles cockroaches
Roberta narrates a dream
Roberta and Bruce go camping right after 9/11
